forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 43. North wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 57. North wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the early hours stretch lazily into dawn over Boston, the atmosphere is crisp and hushed, a gentle promise of the day to come. Tonight has left only a whisper of chill in the air, with temperatures dipping to a refreshing 43 degrees, drawn by a soft north wind that stirs the leaves with a purposeful hint. The skies are clear, hinting at the sun’s triumphant return, its golden rays poised to illuminate the world below.

In the hours ahead, the sun will rise to grace the city with a splendid warmth, bringing a high of around 57 degrees that beckons residents outdoors. With a robust breeze from the north, gusts will dance playfully through the streets, a delightful backdrop for the annual dance of autumn foliage that clings tenaciously to the trees. It’s a day made for stepping lightly through the neighborhoods, perhaps indulging in a warm beverage while savoring the vibrancy of the season. As the day unfolds, dressing in layers will be wise—the chill of morning calls for a cozy sweater, while the afternoon invites light jackets or cardigans that can easily be shed as the sun warms the scene. Whether strolling along the waterfront or exploring charming side streets, the tranquil yet invigorating weather inspires one to seek out the small joys, allowing the soul a few moments of respite in the unfolding tapestry of the day.
